# Sketch {.unnumbered}

```{r}
library(readr)
march_madness <- read_csv("538 Ratings.csv")
View(march_madness)

library(readr)
cbb <- read_csv("cbb.csv")
View(cbb)

```
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
march_madness |>
  str()
```
```{r}
march_madness |>
  ggplot(aes(x = `POWER RATING`)) +
  geom_density()
```
```{r}
march_madness |>
  filter(TEAM =="Duke") |>
  ggplot(aes(x = YEAR, y = SEED)) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r}
uconn <- march_madness|>
  filter(TEAM == "Connecticut")

uconn |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = YEAR, y = ROUND)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
```
```{r}
 march_madness_new <- march_madness |>
  mutate(SEED = as.character(SEED))

march_madness_new <- march_madness_new|>
full_join(cbb)
```

  
```{r}
march_madness_new |>
aggregate(`3P_O` ~ CONF + YEAR, FUN = mean) |>
  filter(CONF %in% c("ACC", "B10", "B12", "SEC", "P12")) |>
 # filter(YEAR == "2016") |>
  ggplot(aes(x = CONF, y = `3P_O`)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "3 Point Percentage by Conference", 
       x = "Conference",
       y = "3 Point %") +
  theme_minimal()
```
```{r}

CONF_win_perc <- march_madness_new |>
  group_by(CONF) |>
  summarise(
    total_games_played = sum(G, na.rm = TRUE),
    total_games_won = sum(W, na.rm = TRUE),
    win_percentage = total_games_won / total_games_played * 100
  )

 
```

```{r}
ggplot(CONF_win_perc, aes(x = CONF, y = win_percentage, fill = win_percentage)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(
    title = "Win Percentage by Conference",
    x = "Conference",
    y = "Win Percentage (%)",
    fill = "Win Rate (%)"
  ) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "lightblue", high = "darkblue") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 8))
```


```{r}
march_madness_new |>
  filter(CONF %in% c("ACC", "B10", "B12", "SEC", "P12")) |>
ggplot(aes(x = `3P_O`, y = W)) +
    geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(~CONF) +
  labs(x = "3 Point %", 
       y = "Number of Wins")



```

```{r}
march_madness_new |>
  filter(ROUND == "1") 
```

```{r}
march_madness_new |>
  filter(CONF %in% c("ACC", "B10", "B12", "SEC", "P12")) |>
  ggplot(aes (x = ADJDE, y = W, color = CONF)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(x = "Defense Efficiency", y = "Wins")
```
